LanguageData.DMS_BF_ExtendArmor.label: extended armor plate
LanguageData.DMS_BF_ExtendArmor.description: Composite armor plate suitable for battle-frame pylons. Effectively resist direct hits to the chassis from low-level threats such as fragmentation and medium-caliber gunfire.
LanguageData.DMS_BF_ExtendCargo.label: extended cargo rack
LanguageData.DMS_BF_ExtendCargo.description: Side mounted cargo racks suitable for battle frame pylons which increase the carrying capacity of the frame.
LanguageData.DMS_CeramicsPlating.label: ceramic plates
LanguageData.DMS_CeramicsPlating.description:
Disposable ceramic armor plating which offers increased protection at the cost of survivability.
It is an excellent protective armor,but must be completely replaced once damaged.
LanguageData.DMS_CeramicsPlating.descriptionCached:
Disposable ceramic armor plating which offers increased protection at the cost of survivability.
It is an excellent protective armor,but must be completely replaced once damaged.
LanguageData.DMS_NuclearBattery.label: nuclear battery
LanguageData.DMS_NuclearBattery.description: The output of an installed nuclear fission battery eliminates the need for recharging. It can also be overloaded to produce a chain reaction causing a detonation comparable to an anti-grain warhead. Survival odds for all parties in its vicinity are low.
LanguageData.DMS_ReinforcedFrame.label: reinforced frame
LanguageData.DMS_ReinforcedFrame.description: Tungsten steel parts replace those that are prone to wear and tear, improving reliability during high-intensity combat and reducing time spent on maintenance. The parts are significantly heavier and will slow down the mech.
LanguageData.DMS_SyntheticTendon.label: synthetic tendon
LanguageData.DMS_SyntheticTendon.description: A biosynthetic muscle attached on the outer layer of the mechanical limb. Increases output at the cost of additional energy consumption.
LanguageData.DMS_TB_HeavyHydraulicFrame.label: heavy hydraulic frame
LanguageData.DMS_TB_HeavyHydraulicFrame.description: A heavy hydraulic module with a power-pack for bipedal mechs providing the capability for heavier lifting and also mounting heavy weapons.
